attributes.action: stop the devisive "muslim acheiver of the year awards"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This award ceremony supported by the government and the race relations board to activly recognise muslims as a special minority requiring special treatment is divisive and serves no purpose to encourage integration.once again we see a minority being elevated above the majority and supported in a disproportional manor to the general populus.while we welcome and applaud muslims and any minority who seek to improve their own lives and immerse themselves in their community,providing a special award ceremony for them creates an atmosphere of division,not integration - for are we not all equal in the eyes of the law?let us be treated as such

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
